channel.title: D/c - Loading.. Please wait
channel.description:
Well whenever I hit a Loading.. Please wait place, my Moparscape d/cs me. When I try to reloggin it says I have to restart the server which I do. Then when I log in again the game just freezes and d/cs and when i try to Re login once again! It just tells me to click cancel, start server and it just repeats the process until I make a new account.. Any ideas? Btw I'm using pimpscape (Am I supposed to put moparscape inside the pimpscape folder?) Thanks in advance,
-Kiroshin
